name: sdk
description: Data-oriented operating space of associative data representation. Wellcome to the deep universe

scripts.electron:pack: npm run build && node patch-electron-builder.cjs && electron-builder --publish never -c ./electron-builder.config.json
scripts.electron:pack-demo: npm run build  && node patch-electron-builder.cjs && CSC_IDENTITY_AUTO_DISCOVERY=false electron-builder --publish never -c ./electron-builder.config.demo.json
scripts.electron:sign: npm run electron:sign-prod && npm run electron:sign-dev
scripts.electron:sign-prod: electron-osx-sign dist/mas/sdk.app --entitlements=./entitlements.mas.plist --entitlements-inherit=./entitlements.mas.inherit.plist --identity='Developer ID Application: ABRAKAR, OOO (8ZG6TUT4AY)' --platform=mas --type=distribution --provisioning-profile=developer-id-sdk.provisionprofile
scripts.electron:sign-dev: electron-osx-sign dist/mas-dev/sdk.app --identity='Developer ID Application: ABRAKAR, OOO (8ZG6TUT4AY)' --platform=mas --type=development --entitlements=./entitlements.mas.plist --entitlements-inherit=./entitlements.mas.inherit.plist --provisioning-profile=./sdkdevelopment.provisionprofile
scripts.electron:make-and-publish: npm run build && electron-builder build --config ./electron-builder.config.json --publish always
